author: Viznab88
title: GME Holders on 2/9
content:
I invested in changing a broken/cheated system.

My investment going to 0 means the system won, and that we are to only play by the rules set out  by the ones in power. Effectively means, you can only win against your small fellow retail investor, never against big money.

I can accept that and play the game by those rules - no problem, have been doing that for a long while. However, it was worth my investment to try and turn it around.

IMO this was the only chance - by now it is clear that the system cannot be changed by us. Ergo, we will never have the same opportunity.

Call me a sentimentalist, but I'm sad more about that than the loss of the money I threw at it.

author: 1mikeg
title: Weed about to make me a millionaire in 2021 🌳🚀🌳🚀🌳🚀
content: Yeah, they get 3 in a year, one for revenue, spending, and the federal debt limit.  A new federal tax on weed sales and interstate distribution could easily be construed as a revenue reconciliation bill.

author: Kaslight
title: PROOF that GME is not a sell off but short attacks
content:
This seems to be the obvious answer. All these armchair ladder attack short squeeze gurus are making all these predictions but the only constant here is that GME continues to Meteor and goalposts move. 

Today was supposed to be the day, and it's dropping to a new floor. If nothing magical happens today, you guys left should honestly just cut your losses.

These HFs not only already have the info we were hoping for, but they have resources we don't too. We beat them because we blindsided them, but at this point its clear they have successfully responded.

Like Cuban said....NEXT TIME, wsb can actually win. But not by ignoring common sense and becoming an internet cult.
